item.title: Alias-Free Mamba Neural Operator
item.description: MambaNO: a novel neural operator achieving linear complexity and state-of-the-art accuracy in solving PDEs by cleverly balancing global and local information using an alias-free architecture.

item.title: EfficientCAPER: An End-to-End Framework for Fast and Robust Category-Level Articulated Object Pose Estimation
item.description: EfficientCAPER: A novel end-to-end framework achieves fast & robust category-level articulated object pose estimation by using a joint-centric approach, eliminating post-processing optimization and en…
